name: netwin-tournament-admin-functions
description: Cloud Functions for Netwin Tournament Admin

scripts.build: powershell -Command "if (Test-Path .\lib\server) { Remove-Item -Recurse -Force .\lib\server }; cd ../server; tsc --project tsconfig.json; cd ../admin-functions; tsc; if (!(Test-Path .\lib\server)) { New-Item -ItemType Directory -Path .\lib\server | Out-Null }; Get-ChildItem -Path ..\server\lib\* | ForEach-Object { Copy-Item -Recurse -Force $_.FullName .\lib\server\ }"
scripts.serve: npm run build && firebase emulators:start --only functions
